title: @ riot - rewards gone wrong? (or just gone?)
body:
within the last couple of weeks or so i got a mystery chest thing pop up on the client saying that i got a certain amount of honours in a certain area or something (if you want i can fetch my honour points) and i had a reward of some sort, but i clicked on the button and it disappeared with, so far, no reward having shown up.

was that meant to happen?
and if so, what was the reward?

replies.body: its a little icon on your loading screen. if its honorable opponent only the enemy sees it irc, if its one of the other 3, you and your team see it.

> [{quoted}](name=KingDinger,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=73xRf2ps,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2015-03-01T11:10:16.296+0000)
>
> its a little icon on your loading screen. if its honorable opponent only the enemy sees it irc, if its one of the other 3, you and your team see it.

ah thanks. i thought i got an icon or something.

wouldn't it be nice if the banners could be multiple? so you could show off all the honours
Your team can see the honorable opponent icon.
